title: E-liter 3K Scope
paragraphs: The E-liter 3K Scope (NA), or E-Litre 3K Scope (EU/OC), is a main weapon in Splatoon.

The E-liter 3K Scope is an E-liter 3K with a scope attached. Compared to the scopeless version it has enhanced range and a zoomed view for greater aiming precision, but players have their field of vision limited by the scope. Besides this, all other stats are the same as the E-liter 3K, and it shares its sub and special weapons.
In later installments, this weapon was replaced with an updated version called the E-liter 4K Scope.
The E-liter 3K Scope is nearly identical in appearance to the E-liter 3K. However, the E-liter 3K Scope has a dark-blue scope attached to the barrel, along with a black metal sight.
The E-liter 3K Scope was released on 22 July 2015 at 02:00 UTC.[1]
It comes with the same set as the un-scoped E-liter 3K, Burst Bombs and the Echolocator.

The E-liter 3K Scope is an E-liter 3K with an added scope for effective long-distance aiming. It's great for hitting far-off targets, but your view is narrow while charging, so careful where you use it!(NA)

- The E-liter 3K Scope is a heavyweight weapon.

- Ink consumption scales from 2.55% to 30% depending on the charge level.
The full-charge ink consumption of 30% allows players to fire 3 shots before needing to refill the ink supply.
This stat can be changed with Ink Saver (Main).
- The scoped view begins to appear at 50% charge and becomes fully zoomed in at 100% charge.
- The scope limits the y-axis field of view to 20 degrees.
- The E-liter 3K Scope cannot store its charge.

- It takes 1.57 seconds to fully charge the weapon.
When charging a shot with an empty tank, the charge rate is 33.33%, permitting the player to fully charge a shot in 4.7 seconds.
- Shots cannot pierce through enemies.
- When charging while moving, the player's movement speed is set to 0.15 units per frame.
- Damage scales from 40 to 100 depending on the charge level. At full charge, the damage is 180.
- Shot velocity scales from 12 to 49.86 units per frame depending on the charge level. At full charge, the velocity is 64 units per frame.
- Shot distance scales from 90 to 272 depending on the charge level. At full charge, the distance is 374.
- The full-charge ink consumption of 30% allows players to fire 3 shots before needing to refill the ink supply.
- This stat can be changed with Ink Saver (Main).
